description: The EU gets its first new member in six years, but it's something less than a celebration.
contentencoded:
The European Union gets its first new member in six years, but it's something less than a celebration. Croatia, the 28th member of the EU, will be the first new entrant since the euro-crisis.

The BBC's Guy De Launey joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio from Croatia's capital, Zagreb, to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 1, 2013
teaser: The EU gets its first new member in six years, but it's something less than a celebration.
title: Croatia joins EU after decade of negotiations
